name: suspender
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] UK (US garter) a long piece of elastic that hangs down from a suspender belt and holds a stocking up suspenders [ plural ] US (UK braces)
a pair of narrow straps that stretch from the front of the trousers over your shoulders to the back to hold them up: He stood with his thumbs under his suspenders.
